title: How to Catch Virizion in Pokémon Black and White

steps.title: After receiving the National Pokédex, head to Pinwheel Forest.
steps.content: After receiving the National Pokédex, head to Pinwheel Forest.

steps.title: Go until you find a log.
steps.content: Go until you find a log.

steps.title: Enter Rumination Field and talk to Virizion to start the battle!
steps.content: Enter Rumination Field and talk to Virizion to start the battle! Virizion is level 42 and has Sacred Sword, Retaliate, Giga Drain, and Helping Hand in its moveset.
